summary: Mehrunes Razor replacer this is a mod that changes the Weapon Chances to kill and i increased its value and name.......so if you got any better ideas let me know i wanna hear them  ......
descriptionHtml:
this is my first mod ....all right lets rule   
1: installation  extract the file too ------->   Programfilesx86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data then just activate the mod 
2: this is just a replacer i increased the daggers damage and vallue and its name i named it : demons edge .........im sorry im not good at english not so good but if you got any problems inform me   have fun with this mod  and let me a credit if you got any other ideas and i need some modders too have fun kiling people and i increased the charge of.....kiling this is NOT A REXTURE THIS IS NOT! if you dont like it dont download it simple
author: mikethriller
